programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Once every 10 years, a mysterious glowing dragon visits Berk and this year Hiccup and Astrid are determined to find out where it's coming from – and stop it from reaching the village.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy's back on the case when something goes wrong with Smartysaurus's rainbow experiment . He needs to investigate. He figures out that the rainbow colours have all been put in a different order. Using his investigation kit and all his who, what, why, where, when and how questions he e follows all the clues - which leads him eventually to Fuse's workshop. Fuse admits that he changed the order of the rainbow test tubes from colour to size order. He's very sorry for ruining the experiment! Noddy helps Smartysaurus reorder the colours and this time the Rainbow experiment is a huge success! Case closed!

programme.title: City Of Ember
programme.desc: Ember was built as a refuge for humanity 200 years ago. Now, the great generator that powers the city is failing, and Ember is falling into darkness as the dazzling lights begin to flicker and fade.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Shanghai
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as an American intelligence official who returns to Shanghai in late 1941 to investigate the death of a friend, which leads him to both love and a much larger conspiracy.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon, who once again finds that forces with ancient roots are willing to stop at nothing, even murder, to advance their goals.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protégé and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: A cop must fight his evil double from a parallel universe in order to save himself and the world.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.desc: Nilalang tackles the underbelly of corrupt Philippine cops with the Japanese 'Yakuza' and its links to a centuries' old curse that may be responsible for the spate of serial killings happening in Manila.

programme.title: Bilibid Or Nut
programme.desc: Sixto (Niño Muhlach) has always been the jealous type, the kind of guy who launches a verbal assault every time he sees his girlfriend to any other man. But one day, after a rather scandalous fit of jealousy, something terrible happens and he is accused of killing her.

programme.title: Laruang Buhay
programme.desc: Paulo (Raul Zaragoza) is a policeman with a special mission: to find his missing brother. In search for the sibling who rebelled against him, Paulo finds himself in a far-flung town where the mayor is king and the people are timid subjects.

programme.title: Reyna
programme.desc: Ginnieffer Balisteros, a sad,insecure and desperate woman who feels the need to win a beauty pageant to prove her self-worth.

programme.title: Columbo S6 E04 - Try And Catch Me
programme.desc: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.However, beneath all that comical exterior was probably the most dogged investigator in the Los Angeles Police Department.

programme.title: Married With Children S1 E11 - Where's The Boss?
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married… With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: CSI S3 E11 - Recipe for Murder
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Stephen King's IT E03 - Part III
programme.desc: IT rises from dank, dark places. IT preys on children. IT knows exactly what scares you--and IT never goes away.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: In the Bible, there are two Arks, each designed by God himself. Both the Ark of the Covenant and Noah's Ark were built to protect but lost to history. Did either exist, and if so, where could they be?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the top ten mysteries of the deep, from sunken continents to puzzling ruins on the ocean floor and even artefacts that might be remnants of Atlantis.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: There have been many sacred relics believed to be imbued with mystical powers. Is it possible that these ordinary items, like a tooth, or a soldier's spear, can have the ability to perform miracles?

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: The founding fathers of the biggest retail stores in the world battle to be the first to innovate, build, and revolutionise the industry. And Sam Walton will construct the world's largest retail empire.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Golden Divas
programme.desc: Watch as they take you back to the glorious ’60s and ’70s. Pilita Corales "Asia’s Queen of Song", Carmen Pateña dubbed as the "Shirley Bassey of the Philippines", and Carmen Soriano will render their signature songs.

programme.title: Sana Ay Ikaw Na Nga
programme.desc: Vina Morales played Jessica in this movie. Jessica was an upcoming singer who met Gary (Keempee de Leon), a lead singer of the band and Karlo (Christopher de Leon), Gary's older brother who was an ex-convict. This love triangle story is about love, music and drugs.

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Nawawala Sa Sarili
programme.desc: Dina Bonnevie plays Alvina, a young woman from a religious and conservative family, who was thought by everyone to be mad, but is in truth, being possessed by the devil.

programme.title: Dalhin Mo Ako Sa Langit
programme.desc: Lani (Ynez Veneracion) is an ambitious village lass who wants to better her life. She uses her beauty towards this end and manages to worm her way into a rich family.

programme.title: Pangarap na Ginto
programme.desc: High School friends Sheila (Dina), Daisy (Dawn) and Sandy (Timmy) renew their ties after a school reunion. Turns out all three has given false claims. Soon, each one learns to deal with their own personal problem with the help of each other's company.

programme.title: Kolehiyala
programme.desc: Three girls in their first year of college face varied but equally difficult problems. They lead their lives very different from the country's perception of the "kolehiyala" as a young, innocent girl.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Ang Paghihiganti ni David Burdado
programme.desc: After the murder of his parents, the surviving son vows to take the law into his hands.

programme.title: Okey Si Ma'am
programme.desc: Keempee, Donna, Paco and Lander played high school senior students each having their own personal dilemmas. Ms. Sonia (Alice Dixson), with her unorthodox way of teaching became their counselor and friend who brought out the best in her students.

programme.title: Titser's Enemi No. 1
programme.desc: The four members of the notorious campus gang, D'titser's enemy, were busy playing their bad jokes again on everybody. Their favorite victims were their teachers, who got the lions' share of the gangs' pranks.

programme.title: Muling Umawit Ang Puso
programme.desc: A popular singer-actress went into seclusion after the traumatic experience of watching her pregnant sister die in the wake of a stampede of her fans. Nearly twenty years later, she took in a young girl who wanted to be a star and tried to mold her into a copy of what she was before.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco and Caroline Hyde in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Analysing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hearing from the biggest newsmakers, and showcasing the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets

programme.title: Document 72 hours
programme.desc: A national road winds through a rugged mountain range on the Kii Peninsula. We drove the length of this road over three days to meet some of the residents in this remote region.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Japan Railway Journal
programme.desc: Iwate Prefecture is home to a number of unique railways and popular tourist trains. See the different initiatives JR and Iwate Prefecture are taking to increase railway tourism.

programme.title: NHK NEWS 7
programme.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: Recently the number of men in South Korea taking paternity leave has doubled, but upon returning to work, many face harassment or interference, prompting the need to reconsider parenting roles.

programme.title: NEWSROOM TOKYO

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: For over 20 years, Nagamine Takashi has been working to protect the Okinawa rail, a bird species native to the Yambaru area of Okinawa. He talks about the importance of saving animals for the future.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo mini
programme.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

programme.title: Empowering kids through song
programme.desc: A Brazilian woman living in Japan is trying to promote a music video she made for kids about sexual abuse while navigating the differences between the two cultures.

programme.desc: Many elderly Japanese have difficulty chewing or swallowing, and must follow soft, nutritional "dysphagia diets." Kawabata Eri is teaching caregivers how to make appetizing dysphagia-friendly dishes.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo mini
programme.desc: Our focus this time is wasabi. Visit a culturally significant paddy field, try a unique grater that offers stronger pungency, and learn more about the cultivation history of Japan's fiery root.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: The Bird Cafe
programme.desc: We visit an Edo-style open-air teahouse, where the townspeople enjoyed refreshments, conversation, and the company of exotic birds. For them, these outings were about more than a good time.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: A Japanese hospital has succeeded in having chronic spinal cord injury patients walk without crutches in daily life by using two types of robotic devices in rehabilitation.

programme.desc: Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When the Yucky Ducky covers Axle City in icky, sticky grossigoo, it's up to Special Mission Blaze to stop her machine and save the world from being grossified... forever!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new “super trike”. // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mr. Porters van full of puppy food slides on the ice near the shore; Ryder and the PAW Patrol must save the day! // Katie and her cat Cali are on the chair lift when it stops leaving them above the ski hill with no way to get down!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Café Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora's family makes a piñata for Mami's birthday, but it flies away! They have to get it back safe before Mami arrives. / Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket! Now Invisi-Swiper is swiping everything, and it's up to Dora and Boots to stop him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party. // When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.desc: Gather 'round for a most hackful holiday celebration, as Brooke and Kevin demonstrate how to navigate any holiday office party like a pro Elf, and explain how the ball drop became a New Year's tradition.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.desc: Watch semi-trucks wreak havoc on roadways, criminals flee cops in pursuit, and crashes, collisions and cars flying through the air -- a dashboard camera can capture it all.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Days Of Thunder
programme.desc: A hotshot stock car racer finds more than fame in the south - love for a neurosurgeon who has a marked disdain for racing.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: There comes a time in every adolescent's life when he must fake out his parents and blow off a day of school. This is Ferris Bueller's day. A grandmaster in the game of adult manipulation.

programme.title: Three Days Of The Condor
programme.desc: A studious CIA analyst in Manhattan is faced with a grisly discovery: his colleagues are dead. Now, he must navigate a web of deception to uncover the truth.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: The story concerns a squad of U.S. Army soldiers on a perilous assignment behind enemy lines. The mission: to risk their lives to save the life of one man, paratrooper James Ryan. Ryan is the last survivor of a family of four brothers, the rest of whom have been killed in action.

programme.title: Three Days Of The Condor
programme.desc: A studious CIA analyst in Manhattan is faced with a grisly discovery: his colleagues are dead. Now, he must navigate a web of deception to uncover the truth.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate

programme.desc: There comes a time in every adolescent's life when he must fake out his parents and blow off a day of school. This is Ferris Bueller's day. A grandmaster in the game of adult manipulation.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: In a land where beauty is preserved by the innocence of those who live there, two young people become entangled in the ongoing battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Three Days Of The Condor
programme.desc: A studious CIA analyst in Manhattan is faced with a grisly discovery: his colleagues are dead. Now, he must navigate a web of deception to uncover the truth.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness
programme.desc: The story of a mysterious mansion, Karikal Mahal in early 1900s Singapore that looked like a palace with its lake, fountains and bungalows on sprawling grounds the size of two-and-a-half football fields.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Chain Mail
programme.desc: A chain mail is forwarded to a group of people - some pass it on while others ignore it. After one of them suddenly dies, a series of mysterious deaths follows. Sandra learns that the chain mail is cursed and decides to find the origin and mystery behind to stop the misfortune. Will she break the curse before it's too late?

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives head to Texas to chase down two suspects after they kill a young father of two.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S7)
programme.desc: A new inmate enters the men's pod and begins rustling everyone's feathers. Darius and Carlos work together to protect the pod and keep the peace.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A couple go on a cruise to repair their marriage, but their week alone comes to a tragic end when her body falls from an upper deck. Is it an accident, or has something more sinister taken place?

programme.title: Cold Case Files: The Rifkin Murders
programme.desc: Joel Rifkin is providing clues to New York State Police in order to identify two of his 17 victims that remain nameless. Peter Reiss follows up with his own on-camera sit-down with Rifkin to get answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Anatomy Of A Crime
programme.desc: The discovery of a female torso packed in a cardboard box leads Singapore police to a love affair gone wrong.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Those closest to Madison Nygard share the agonising details around the beautiful 16-year-old's terrifying abduction as she walked home from a party.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Police race across three states to catch a bus carrying an alleged gunman threatening to kill everyone onboard. On the coast of Florida, a toddler fights for her life after being found face down in a pool.

programme.title: Bien Bâti
programme.desc: A businessman shows us around the Garneau saddle room, which he restored for the benefit of his home town. We also discover a windmill put back into use by the local community. And close-up look at a talented art carpenter.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: It's the teacher's birthday! The whole class celebrates with him in a light and joyful atmosphere. But Api is not in the mood for the party: her friends no longer speak to her.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: The day after the Hall'onion fair, Alix investigates in order to help her friends find the harvest of caramelised onions that has been stolen.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'Isabelle Et Ricardo
programme.desc: Accompanied by Ricardo, Isabelle combines the flavours of two delicious desserts as she prepares moist carrot-cake style brioches that would be perfect to grace any breakfast table.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Mise Au Point
programme.desc: The best reports from ''Mise au Point'', the programme that takes a fresh look at national and international news events. Through its exclusive investigations and in-depth reports, ''Mise au Point'' tackles a wide range of topics: politics, economics, social issues, sports, culture and new trends.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Un Soupçon
programme.desc: A man's corpse is found in his torched car. Pascal, the victim, was drugged before being executed. Suspicions lead Captain Delboscq on the trail of Isabelle, the deceased's wife. Her very ordinary-looking life is full of disturbing and suspicious details.

programme.title: Un Soupçon
